tool_description: Returns the details, including: Japanese Name, Romanji, Race, First Appearances and more of your favorite Characters in Overlord (As of Volume 14)
name: Overlord Characters
title: Overlord Characters

api_list.name: Get Character by Name
api_list.description: By inputting the name as it appears on the Wiki, would return information pertaining to Character.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://overlord-characters.p.rapidapi.com/characters/name/Momonga"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "overlord-characters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://overlord-characters.p.rapidapi.com/characters/name/{charactername}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "overlord-characters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All 400+ Characters Unorganized
api_list.description: Returns the Entire List of Characters from Overlord up to Volume 14.

headers = {

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Characters by Affiliation
api_list.description: The Characters in Overlord have various Affiliations they they recognize themselves under ie "Blue Roses",  and "Darkness", by putting in the organization will return the Characters that belong to it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://overlord-characters.p.rapidapi.com/characters/affiliation/Darkness"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "overlord-characters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://overlord-characters.p.rapidapi.com/characters/affiliation/{affiliationname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "overlord-characters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
